param.name: sender
param.span: 事件处理程序附加到的对象。

span.span: The object where the event handler is attached.

summary.span: 表示将处理 附加事件的方法。

span.span: Represents a method that will handle the attached event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尝试复制操作期间将一种数据格式添加到数据对象时发生事件。The event occurs when an attempt is made to add a data format to the data object during a copy operation. A事件处理程序方法通常用于通过筛选从应用于不需要或不需要的数据格式应用复制命令优化。A event handler method is typically used to apply copy command optimization by filtering unwanted or unneeded data formats from being applied to a .
